ADC1 GPIO Configuration PA0-WKUP ------> ADC1_IN0 PA1 ------> ADC1_IN1 PA2 ------> ADC1_IN2 PA3 ------> ADC1_IN3 PA4 ------> ADC1_IN4
ADC2 GPIO Configuration PA5 ------> ADC2_IN5 PA6 ------> ADC2_IN6 PA7 ------> ADC2_IN7 PC4 ------> ADC2_IN14 PC5 ------> ADC2_IN15 PB0 ------> ADC2_IN8 PB1 ------> ADC2_IN9
ADC3 GPIO Configuration PC0 ------> ADC3_IN10 PC1 ------> ADC3_IN11 PC2 ------> ADC3_IN12 PC3 ------> ADC3_IN13
ADC1 GPIO Configuration PA0-WKUP ------> ADC1_IN0 PA1 ------> ADC1_IN1 PA2 ------> ADC1_IN2 PA3 ------> ADC1_IN3 PA4 ------> ADC1_IN4
Uncomment the line below to disable the "ADC_IRQn" interrupt Be aware, disabling shared interrupt may affect other IPs
ADC2 GPIO Configuration PA5 ------> ADC2_IN5 PA6 ------> ADC2_IN6 PA7 ------> ADC2_IN7 PC4 ------> ADC2_IN14 PC5 ------> ADC2_IN15 PB0 ------> ADC2_IN8 PB1 ------> ADC2_IN9
Uncomment the line below to disable the "ADC_IRQn" interrupt Be aware, disabling shared interrupt may affect other IPs
ADC3 GPIO Configuration PC0 ------> ADC3_IN10 PC1 ------> ADC3_IN11 PC2 ------> ADC3_IN12 PC3 ------> ADC3_IN13
Uncomment the line below to disable the "ADC_IRQn" interrupt Be aware, disabling shared interrupt may affect other IPs

briefdescription.para: This file provides code for the configuration of the ADC instances.
